1989.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|137|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|129|59$وَصَدُّواْ|and hindered|105|142|4660$عَن|from|54|91|1105$سَبِيلِ|(the) way|86|123|1358$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|104|2$زِدْنَـٰهُمْ|We will increase them|164|173|10103$عَذَابًا|(in) punishment|123|141|2933$فَوْقَ|over|62|80|2928$ٱلْعَذَابِ|punishment|95|113|482$بِمَا|because|75|93|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|126|94$يُفْسِدُونَ|spread corruption.|141|141|10104$

1990.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And the Day|102|108|819$نَبْعَثُ|We will resurrect|131|144|10095$فِى|among|63|76|89$كُلِّ|every|57|70|185$أُمَّةٍ|nation|61|74|3159$شَهِيدًا|a witness|83|96|1279$عَلَيْهِم|over them|87|100|22$مِّنْ|from|50|56|53$أَنفُسِهِمْ‌ۖ|themselves.|99|116|1025$وَجِئْنَا|And We (will) bring|145|180|4011$بِكَ|you|47|82|2798$شَهِيدًا|(as) a witness|115|150|1279$عَلَىٰ|over|63|98|52$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ‌ۚ|these.|82|99|335$وَنَزَّلْنَا|And We sent down|145|159|10105$عَلَيْكَ|to you|71|99|2245$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|113|451$تِبْيَـٰنًا|(as) a clarification|141|169|10106$لِّكُلِّ|of every|75|103|3746$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|83|186$وَهُدًى|and a guidance|121|156|921$وَرَحْمَةً|and mercy|92|163|4357$وَبُشْرَىٰ|and glad tidings|124|195|922$لِلْمُسْلِمِينَ|for the Muslims.|125|160|10107$

1991.verse: ۞ إِنَّ|Indeed,|88|95|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|68|184$يَأْمُرُ|commands|89|104|6347$بِٱلْعَدْلِ|justice|82|97|2515$وَٱلْإِحْسَـٰنِ|and the good,|113|128|10108$وَإِيتَآىِٕ|and giving|87|102|10109$ذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ|(to) relatives,|125|132|3984$وَيَنْهَىٰ|and forbids|93|119|10110$عَنِ|[from]|61|112|1663$ٱلْفَحْشَآءِ|the immorality|113|164|10111$وَٱلْمُنكَرِ|and the bad|101|152|10112$وَٱلْبَغْىِ‌ۚ|and the oppression.|151|177|10113$يَعِظُكُمْ|He admonishes you|147|222|2045$لَعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|279|193$تَذَكَّرُونَ|take heed.|99|174|6186$

1992.verse: وَأَوْفُواْ|And fulfil|85|93|417$بِعَهْدِ|the covenant|109|126|3025$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|98|2$إِذَا|when|55|72|1370$عَـٰهَدتُّمْ|you have taken a covenant,|208|225|7401$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|112|25$تَنقُضُواْ|break|92|100|10114$ٱلْأَيْمَـٰنَ|oaths|86|101|5202$بَعْدَ|after|52|67|1117$تَوْكِيدِهَا|their confirmation|136|151|10115$وَقَدْ|while verily|93|108|2117$جَعَلْتُمُ|you have made|121|136|10116$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|61|184$عَلَيْكُمْ|over you|79|95|416$كَفِيلاً‌ۚ|a surety.|80|112|10117$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|102|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|85|184$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|93|742$مَا|what|53|85|262$تَفْعَلُونَ|you do.|87|103|10118$

1993.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|111|25$تَكُونُواْ|be|84|96|427$كَٱلَّتِى|like her who|99|111|10119$نَقَضَتْ|untwists|86|98|10120$غَزْلَهَا|her spun yarn|111|123|10121$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|103|280$قُوَّةٍ|strength|76|82|7339$أَنكَـٰثًا|(into) untwisted strands;|187|201|10122$تَتَّخِذُونَ|you take|95|123|6546$أَيْمَـٰنَكُمْ|your oaths|91|119|5216$دَخَلاَۢ|(as) a deception|130|158|10123$بَيْنَكُمْ|between you,|111|125|1657$أَن|because|75|82|655$تَكُونَ|is|72|86|2402$أُمَّةٌ|a community|104|118|1224$هِىَ|[it]|53|68|665$أَرْبَىٰ|more numerous|120|134|10124$مِنْ|than|50|64|53$أُمَّةٍ‌ۚ|(another) community.|164|171|3159$إِنَّمَا|Only,|55|71|102$يَبْلُوكُمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah tests you|123|154|10125$بِهِۦ‌ۚ|by it.|55|86|204$وَلَيُبَيِّنَنَّ|And He will make clear|168|199|10126$لَكُمْ|to you|63|94|207$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|121|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection,|164|189|820$مَا|what|53|103|262$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|161|214$فِيهِ|in it|49|99|32$تَخْتَلِفُونَ|differ.|99|124|2931$

1989.verse: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.

1990.verse: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.

1991.verse: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.

1992.verse: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.

1993.verse: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.

1994.verse: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
